== Main Inclusion Report for blender ==

# ''Availability:'' The package is available in ubuntu universe and builds on our three major platforms
# ''Rationale:'' The package is required for the Edubuntu desktop
# ''Security:'' No CVEs or other security issues
# ''Quality assurance:''  
** Needs no setup after install
** 2 FTBFS bugs and 10 important bugs in <nowiki>[[http://bugs.debian.org/blender|Debbugs]]</nowiki>. <nowiki>[[http://projects.blender.org/tracker/index.php?group_id=9&atid=125|upstream]]</nowiki> has a total of 4 open bugs for version 2.36 (currently used by us and debian) , 1 of them marked at priority 1
# ''Standards compliance:'' The package meets the FHS but has 2 Debian Policy bugs (FTBFS, seems solved in ubuntu).
# ''Dependencies:''
** scons and ftgl-dev are in universe, both have a report and are approved
